column1: ***The three of them sits idle infront of their new detective agency***
Kochunni  : Detective company thodangi irkkan thogeet kore divasayii...oru case polum veranillaloo
Vikraman  : Sahadeva namakk oru pidikitta pulliye pidich kodtha nalla publicity kitoole...
Kochunni  : Aynu pidikitta pulliye evde poyi pidikkan aanu
Sahadevan : Eda Thorappa ninak onnnu sahayichoode daa
Kochunni  : Ambada pulusoo...ingane aanel njan illa tta
Vikraman  : Kitty...!!! Annu bomb beeshany ullavadem avan indayirunnu sammelana chadangilum avan indayirunnu
***Shows a Maniac who fools around carrying a dummy gun***
Sahadevan : Avan verum oru pottan alley...
Vikraman  : Avan pottane pole abhinayikunnathanu...alland CM pona stalathokke thokkum kond chellan avanendha Pottanaa
Sahadevan : Enna vikremetta namukk avane pidikoodam
Kochunni  : Aaa angu chellu avan pidikkan ninnu therum...
Sahadevan : Shey...ivane njan innu kollum
column2: eda Thorappa ingane aanel njan ninne police karkku pidichu kodukkum nokkiko

column1: Sahadevan : Adangi ninna ninakku kollam
Kochunni  : Oo Sire anisarikkame...
***Moosa and Team waits in his car the he saw that maniac in a car***
Vikraman  : Dhe ponu avan...Sahadeva Change...alla Chasee
Sahadevan : Nammude oro neekangalum valare sookshichayirikanam....
***Moosa chases and blocks that car and he finds a international criminal in that car***
Sahadevan : Hey...!!! Da ivan aa theevara vaadhi alle CM ne kollan sremichavan
Kochunni  : Aa!! adhe idh avan thanne Sahadeva pidicho avane...
Vikraman  : Da dhe aa pottane Mental hospitalille vandeelu aalkaru vanu pidichond ponu....
Sahadevan : Aa pottan potte namuk ivane mathy...!!!
Kochunni  : Vikrametta vilikk Police ne...
***S.I.Peethambaran reaches the place and by that time Moosa went to D.IG with media***
S.I       : Well done ee Samstanam thedi kond irikkunna oru andharashtra kuttavaliye aanu ningal pidikoodyath...
S.I       : Pakshey ithinte credit njan ningakk theraan pokunnilla...
Vikraman  : Sir ithupolathe chetta parupadikal kanikkum ennu Sahadevan paranjirunnu...
athukond media kare okke nerthey vilich kuttavaliyem kond Moosa DIG nerit kaanan poyitund
***D.IG announces 10Lacks price for capturing that culprit***
Sahadevan : Thank You Sir thank u very much
***S.I aliyan goes behind Sahadevan begging***
S.I       : Aliya aliyaa...ninte pengale ketyappo 1 roopa polum streedhanam thannitilla ippoo kityathinte pakuthi engilum enk theruoo...
Sahadevan : Atheenu 10paisa polum therilla
S.I       : Venda aa 10paisa aliyan vecho baaki enik thanoode..!!
Sahadevan : GOOD Bye....!!!
S.I       : Aliyaaa....!!!!
Vikraman  : Chammi poyalle Sire...
S.I       : Podaa...
